column4: phew, ok guys, I fixed my sudo problem by login as root via the recovery boot option and adding my user back to the 'admin' group
but now, since I'm only a member of the groups 'disk' and 'admin', might someone be so kind as to give me a list of all the groups a normal ubuntu user should be a member of?
I'm not sure. I'm just looking for someone to run the groups command, and paste the output here
